text: Waheed Akanni Oseni (born 17 January 1988) is a Nigerian footballer who plays as a centre back or defensive midfielder. ==Club career== He started his career in Nigeria, at Sunshine Stars and in 2006 moved to Beitar Jerusalem. In January 2008 he transferred to Apollon Limassol, where he signed a contract for an initial of 6 months with an option to extend it for 3 years. Apollon exercised the option and extended his contract until 30 June 2012. He then moved to Saudi Professional League club Al-Taawon. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Sunshine Stars F.C. players Category:Beitar Jerusalem F.C. players Category:Apollon Limassol FC players Category:Ethnikos Achna FC players Category:Al-Taawoun FC players Category:Najran SC players Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus Category:Expatriate footballers in Saudi Arabia Category:Nigerian expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Saudi Professional League players
title: Waheed Oseni
